short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to work with GoCoding CRM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At the moment, this extension is intended exclusively for the GoCoding subdomain to expand the capabilities of AlfaCRM. The following functions has been implemented: a system for managing “grades” in the form of argodollars, a children’s credit score system, which depends on various parameters such as academic performance, attendance, tests etc. Also a system for scheduling makeup classes is being developed (it will analyze the child’s level of knowledge in order to determine suitable groups for a makeup).

New features in this release:
- Fixed a bug with student info popping up in wrong places
- Now you can submit personal and family tests at the same time
- Added reason for argodollars
- Added credit score breakdown
- Added history of last operations with argodollars and tests
- Added loading animations
